QuestData.Title: Sindragosa's Fall
QuestData.Description: You're a real star, $n. See, when I give one of these other soldiers an assignment, the odds of them getting it done are about fifty-fifty. The odds of them coming back... well, slightly worse.$B$BBut with you, it's always a guaranteed thing. Like gnomish clockwork!$B$BAnyway, I have another one for you. Sindragosa's Fall, east of the valley. There is some serious cultist activity, including and not limited to, the raising of frost wyrms. I need you to go kick their teeth in.$B$BI hate cultists.
QuestData.LogDescription: Thassarian aboard the Skybreaker wants you to slay 5 Wyrm Reanimators, 8 Cultist Corrupters and 3 Vrykul Necrolords at Sindragosa's Fall.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice job, $n. You make the rest of us look bad!
